reviewText: Documentary story telling but very informative.  I was hoping it would be movie-like.

This is a sincere effort but, I feel compelled to say to future buyers, that this is not a beautifully produced, PBS-type of DVD.  It is more along the lines of a home video with voice-over, like Super Saints on EWTN (gratefully, sans Penny's pontifications).  In other words, it's not bad, but not worth twenty-five bucks.  Ten would be reasonable.
